programme.title: Kahaani 2
programme.desc: Kahaani 2: Durga Rani Singh is a suspense thriller and spiritual successor to the acclaimed Kahaani. It stars Vidya Balan as Vidya Sinha/Durga Rani Singh, a woman whose daughter is kidnapped, leading to a series of events that unravel a dark and painful history. As the investigation progresses, hidden identities, shocking truths, and psychological tension come to the forefront. Directed by Sujoy Ghosh, the film is packed with emotional depth, twists, and a compelling lead performance.

programme.title: Khatta Meetha
programme.desc: Khatta Meetha, directed by Priyadarshan and starring Akshay Kumar and Trisha Krishnan, is a satirical comedy that highlights the absurdities of the Indian bureaucratic system. The film centers around a small-time road contractor who faces numerous hurdles, including red tape, corrupt officials, and family feuds, while trying to complete a government project. Blending humor with social commentary, the movie offers a bittersweet take on systemic flaws and personal perseverance.

programme.title: Antim The Final Truth
programme.desc: Antim: The Final Truth is an action-drama film that portrays the conflict between a fierce cop and a ruthless gangster who rises from poverty and becomes a threat to the system. As their worlds collide, the film explores themes of power, morality, and the consequences of violence. Starring Salman Khan and Aayush Sharma, the movie delivers intense action sequences and emotional depth.

The film centers around a small-time road contractor who faces numerous hurdles, including red tape, corrupt officials, and family feuds, while trying to complete a government project. Blending humor with social commentary, the movie offers a bittersweet take on systemic flaws and personal perseverance.

programme.title: Dream Girl
programme.desc: Karamveer Singh, a young man with an unusual ability to mimic a woman’s voice, lands a job at a friendship call center where he poses as "Pooja." His growing popularity among lonely men—including a cop, a spoiled brat, and even a local goon—spirals into chaos as they all fall in love with "Pooja," unaware of her true identity. The film is a comedy that touches on loneliness, societal pressures, and identity.

programme.title: URI - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, URI – The Surgical Strike chronicles the Indian Army’s 2016 surgical strike on terror launchpads across the Line of Control in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir. Led by Major Vihaan Singh Shergill, the mission is carried out as retaliation for the deadly Uri base camp attack. With intense training, strategic execution, and nationalistic fervor, the film is a gripping military action drama showcasing courage and patriotism.
